methods.name: a
javadoc: Static predicate for determining if the current light level and environmental conditions allow for a monster to spawn.

methods.name: b
javadoc: Static predicate for determining whether or not a monster can spawn at the provided location, incorporating a check of the current light level at the location.

methods.name: c
javadoc: Static predicate for determining whether or not a monster can spawn at the provided location.

methods.name: dC
javadoc: Entity won't drop items or experience points if this returns false

methods.name: u_
javadoc: Called frequently so the entity can update its state every tick as required. For example, zombies and skeletons use this to react to sunlight and start to burn.
